Alteration 2

Mirror Image
Combat
A1
spell id [id]: 608
effect number [effect_number]: 23
damage [damage]: 16777216
spec [spec]: 8405120
casting time [casttime]: 100%
area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 10-
Bless/Buff: Mirrored Image
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], May Use Underwater [uwok])
This spell creates illusionary images of the caster. A skilled Air mage will get more images than a less skilled one. The images will surround the mage and make it harder for enemies to figure out which one to strike. A strike will have an equal chance of hitting each image and the mage and the spell ends as soon as the mage is hit by an attack.
Images created: 2 per Air skill level.
